评论概述: Nice t-shirt but watch the packaging
评论详情: This is a nice little t-shirt, and I am very happy with it.  However, I will caution you - If your order is shipped in a plastic bag, as this t-shirt was, be very careful how you open it.  I am getting more and more orders shipped in these bags, and I have learned to be very careful, as it’s easy to cut into the items you ordered.  Sometimes they are crammed in small bags, or in this case, the t-shirt was packaged with two cards and a hardboard book, and they were shipped in a large bag.  The items in these large bags shift around during shipping, and as I was cutting it open, I realized I was cutting into more than the bag.  Fortunately, I caught it as I was cutting in the clear bag the t-shirt was in before cutting into the t-shirt itself.
